protocol.text: The data were analyzed in FlexArray using RMA (background correction and normalization) and also dChip (subtract MM from PM). dChip(PM-MM) log(2) with p-value, RMA log(2) signal intensity with p-value data can be found on Series (GSE40245_torC-torG.txt.gz and GSE40245_wtC-wtG.txt.gz). ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA log2 signal
Seedlings were treated with or without 15 mM glucose for 2 hours

Arabidopsis wild type (Col-0) and estradiol inducible RNAi-tor plants were grown in 6-well plates containing 1 ml of liquid medium (0.5 x MS, pH 5.7) in a controlled room for 3 days at 22 C, 60% relative humidity, 75 uE light and 12 hr photoperiod.
Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s protocol

Total RNA (5ug) were amplified and biotinylated using the BioArrayTM HighYieldTM RNA transcript labelling kit (Enzo) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The RNA was then fragmented in fragmentation buffer (40 mM Tris-Acetate, pH 8.1, 100 mM KOAc, 30 mM MgOAc), 94 degreeCelsius for 35 minutes.

Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on the Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChips using the Affymetrix 640 Hybridization Oven. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 7G with AutoLoader.
